options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

solution.text:
HCHO+R'MgX→1° alcohol
RCHO+R'MgX→2° alcohol
RCOR'+R''MgX→3° alcohol
As product is 3° alcohol so HCHO cannot be used.
